tool_description: Calculates standardized comorbidity scores and disease burden indices to quantify patient complexity for risk stratification.

scoring_method.description: Comorbidity scoring method: charlson, elixhauser, cci_updated

error_messages: Invalid ICD-10 codes: One or more diagnosis codes are not valid ICD-10 format
Unknown scoring method: Use charlson, elixhauser, or cci_updated
Insufficient diagnoses: At least one valid diagnosis code required for scoring
usage: Provide patient_id and array of icd10_codes. Optionally specify scoring_method for different comorbidity indices. Tool calculates standardized disease burden scores.

high_impact_conditions.description: Conditions with highest impact on score

mortality_risk_category.description: Mortality risk category based on score: low, medium, high
